description: Paleontologists from Flinders University have described three unusual new species of giant fossil kangaroo from Australia and New Guinea, finding them more diverse in shape, range and hopping method than previously thought.
title: Digging up new species of Australia and New Guinea's giant fossil kangaroos

description: Coastal communities need to prepare for simultaneous extreme weather events as heat waves increasingly overlap with surges in sea levels due to climate change, a study published on Thursday warned.
title: Tandem heat waves, storm surges increasingly batter coasts: Study

description: Pottery was largely unknown in Australia before the recent past, despite well-known pottery traditions in nearby Papua New Guinea and the islands of the western Pacific. The absence of ancient Indigenous pottery in Australia has long puzzled researchers.
title: Aboriginal people made pottery, sailed to distant islands thousands of years before Europeans arrived

description: Humankind's two closest primate relatives are often said to embody contrasting sides of our nature: peace-loving bonobos versus violence-prone chimpanzees.
title: Bad boys: Study finds aggressive bonobo males attract more mates

description: One of Brazil's top scientists, Eneas Salati, once said, "The best thing you could do for the Amazon rainforest is to blow up all the roads." He wasn't joking. And he had a point.
title: Scientists find vast numbers of illegal 'ghost roads' used to crack open pristine rainforest
